title: Shortcuts for copy & paste
author: hervehobbes
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
Hello,

Would it be possible to add shortcuts to copy and paste from/to the terminal (ssh mainly)?

Ideally, the same shortucts as in Gnome shell (Ctrl + Shift +C & Ctrl + Shit + V) would be very usefull

Thank you
